properties.body:
SOUTHERN ADRIATIC SEA.
STRAIT OF OTRANTO.
VESSEL CAPSIZED AND ADRIFT WITHIN FIVE MILES OF
BRINDISI (40-39N 017-57E). VESSELS IN VICINITY
REQUESTED TO KEEP A SHARP LOOKOUT, ASSIST
IF POSSIBLE. REPORTS TO MRCC ROME,
INMARSAT-C: 424744220,
PHONE: 39 065 908 4527, 39 065 908 4409,
FAX: 390 6592 2737, 39 065 908 4409,
E-MAIL: ITMRCC@MIT.GOV.IT.
